name: knowledge-hub
description: onc-limbのナレッジベースリポジトリ

scripts.generate-metadata: npx tsc scripts/generate-metadata.ts --outDir dist && node dist/generate-metadata.js
scripts.proofread: cd Proofreading && uv run python main.py proofread -o ./reports -f
scripts.proofread:list: cd Proofreading && uv run python main.py list-files
